valid: For the period 06:00 (UTC) on Wed 17 Sep 2025 to 06:00 (UTC) on Thu 18 Sep 2025
general_synopsis: Low 250 miles west of Rockall 975, expected Bailey 981 by midnight tonight. New high expected Biscay 1024 by same time
